response.overview: A beautiful young woman moves into an old house on the river. The house has been in disrepair for over 50 years, and no one has dared to buy it, until now. Little does she know there is Spanish treasure buried beneath it, but there is one big problem. The true owner though dead is still there. This maniacal spirit will do anything to protect his gold. A hurricane develops just as it did 50 years ago when the old man was struck by lightning. She and her sister, a famous talk show host, must work with a psychic to resolve the crisis and most importantly, stay alive. But beware, Harry is back
response.tagline: Some Secrets Can't Remain Buried Forever
response.title: Haunting Storm
